reference-wr.title: Swift Upload File Size Considerations
reference-wr.shortdesc: For uploads using the CLI, the file size is limited by the PUT maximum, but you can use an option to split the file into segments. For uploads using the web administration interface, additional limitations apply.

section.p: US85034 new topicThe default maximum PUT size is 50GB. For larger files, you can use the -S option on the swift upload command to upload the file in segments:
where segment_size is the maximum segment size in bytes.

For upload using the web administration interface, the split option is not available, and an additional limitation is imposed by the scratch space. The maximum upload size is the available scratch space (7.81 GB or less) or the maximum PUT size, whichever is less.
You can view the available scratch space as follows:
